mapper.insert: insert into clazz(name, room, begin_date, end_date, master_id, subject, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{room}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{masterId}, #{subject}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select:
select id, name, room, begin_date, end_date, master_id, create_time, update_time from clazz c
name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and end_date between #{begin} and #{end}
order by update_time desc
